help:
/wiki - to find an article in Wikipedia
/webarchive - to archive web site with archive.org
/timezone - to show current time at the timezone
/leave - to leave form this chat
leave_permission_denied: This command is only available to administrators
webarchive:
Archiving the web page was requested:
%s
webarchive_undefined: You need to specify the URL
webarchive_not_found: The specified URL was not found
wikipedia_query_undefined: You need to specify title of the article
timezone_undefined: You need to specify the timezone
md_undefined: You need to specify a markdown text
